general.address_extended: Piazzale Caiazzo, 2 Milan, 20124, Italy Near green metro stop M2 Caiazzo

hero.title: A doctor always at your fingertips
hero.description: Wherever you are and at any time, with Infinitydoc, you have the opportunity to have a Televisit or Video visit 24/7.

services.title: Our services designed for you
services.description: Infinitydoc is the innovative medical consulting service that allows you to access a doctor instantly 24/7. If you prefer, you can also visit the clinic or request a home visit with the same availability.

list.title: Teleconsultation
list.description: Available 24/7. Immediate phone call with one of our professional doctors.

list.title: Video Consultation
list.description: Available 24/7. Immediate video call with one of our professional doctors.

list.title: Clinic Consultation
list.description: Book a visit at our clinic in the center of Milan.

list.title: Home Consultation
list.description: We come to you anywhere in Milan and the province.*

list.title: Sport medical certificate
list.description: The medical certificate for sports activities.

list.title: Medical certificate for driving license
list.description: The medical certificate for driving license.

how_it_works.title: In a few clicks, you are in touch with your doctor
how_it_works.description: We have reimagined the process of scheduling a medical visit to make it simpler and faster. With InfinityDoc, you can book a medical visit in just a few clicks, without waiting in line or going to the clinic.

steps.title: Select the type of visit
steps.description: Choose from teleconsultation, video consultation, clinic visit, or home visit.

steps.title: Select the date and time
steps.description: Choose the date and time that suits you for your medical visit.

steps.title: Done! Your doctor is waiting for you
steps.description: Your doctor will contact you at the scheduled time for your medical visit.

plans.title: Choose the plan that suits you
plans.description: With Infinitydoc Membership, you can access subscription levels tailored to you. All our services at a fixed monthly price.

content.title: Standard
features: 1 Home visits at a discounted cost
1 Booking for specialized consultation at a discounted cost (Up to 15% off)

content.title: Premium
features: 2 Home visits at a discounted cost
3 Bookings for specialized consultations at a discounted cost (Up to 15% off)

content.title: Family
features: 3 Home visits at a discounted cost
5 Bookings for specialized consultations at a discounted cost

cures.title: Invest in your well-being now
cures.description: With Infinitydoc, you have the possibility of immediate resolutions at the right time. Whatever happens, we can give you initial guidance to achieve the best results in the shortest possible time. Here is a list of the most frequently resolved issues with our consultations.

list: Laboratory order for sexually transmitted diseases

mission.title: Make healthcare more accessible and affordable
mission.description: We aim to raise the quality of healthcare in Italy and make access to healthcare services simpler and more affordable.

questions.title: How does online booking work?
questions.answer: Choose the service you want, select the day and time you prefer, and proceed with payment. Once the payment is completed, you will receive a confirmation email.

questions.title: How can I pay?
questions.answer: We accept payments by credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfer.

questions.title: Can I cancel the reservation?
questions.answer: You can cancel the reservation up to 24 hours before the appointment. To cancel the reservation, contact us by email or phone.

questions.title: How can I contact you?
questions.description: You can contact us by email at info@infinitydoc.it or by phone at +39 000 000 000.

contacts.title: Come visit us
contacts.description: We look forward to welcoming you to our medical office. Infinitydoc is located at Piazzale Caiazzo 2, just steps away from the green metro stop M2 Caiazzo.

footer.description: InfinityDoc cerca di migliorare costantemente il proprio servizio per garantire la migliore esperienza possibile ai propri pazienti.
contacts: Piazzale Caiazzo, 2 Milano, 20124, Italia Vicino a fermata metro verde M2 Caiazzo
